about_the_game:
Original Frederic: Resurrection of Music Director's Cut Soundtrack!



Tracklist:
01. Midnight Flight To Paris
02. Jamaican Coconuts
03. New Deputy In TownWildWest
04. The Big Wild Apple
05. Exploding Star
06. Bollywood Madness
07. Swing into Istanbul
08. Classical Feelings
09. Chasing the Leprechaun
10. Whales In the Sky
11. The Epic Battle
12. Oriental
14. Frederic Time for Africa

fullgame.name: Frederic: Resurrection of Music Director's Cut

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.4
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Frederic Resurrection of Music Director's Cut: Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
